text: "Queen of Peace" is a 2015 song by English indie rock band Florence and the Machine and is the third single from their third studio album How Big, How Blue, How Beautiful. It went to number 133 in the United Kingdom and the first song to miss the top 100 single Lover to Lover. The music video runs for ten minutes. ==Track listing== *Digital download – Hot Chip Remix #"Queen of Peace" (Hot Chip Remix) – 6:25 == References == Category:2015 songs Category:Florence and the Machine songs
title: Queen of Peace
